alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:42PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otero, northern Las Animas, southwestern Crowley and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 542 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northwest of Delhi, or 34 miles west of La Junta, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fowler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
